remarks.para:
This is the main entry point for the Tingen web service, and contains the two methods required by Avatar:
This class does very little work itself, as the heavy lifting is done in Outpost31.
This source code should be pretty static, and should not be modfied.
Please see the Tingen documentation for more information.

This method is required by Avatar and should not be modified.
The only difference between the development and stable versions of Tingen is that the development version uses
the "UAT" system code, while the stable version uses the "LIVE" system code.
